description: The HYDE version 3.2 contains a global model of 5 arc minute gridded historical population and land use estimates for the past 12,000 years
title: History database of the Global Environment (HYDE) version 3.2
citation: Goldewijk, K. K., Beusen, A., Doelman, J., & Stehfest, E. (2017). Anthropogenic land use estimates for the Holocene - HYDE 3.2. Earth System Science Data, 9(2), 927–953. https://doi.org/10.5194/essd-9-927-2017. Accessed through Resource Watch, (26 April 2022). www.resourcewatch.org.
